web-development.question: How long does it take to build a website?
web-development.answer: It varies from 2-8 weeks depending on the project scope. Simple corporate sites are completed in 2-3 weeks, while complex e-commerce platforms take 6-8 weeks.

web-development.question: What technologies do you use?
web-development.answer: We use Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and modern database solutions. We select the most suitable technology for each project.

web-development.question: Is hosting and domain included?
web-development.answer: We also offer hosting and domain services optionally. We can host on Vercel, AWS, or your preferred platform.

mobile-apps.question: Does the app work on both iOS and Android?
mobile-apps.answer: Yes, we develop applications that work on both platforms with a single codebase using React Native or Flutter.

mobile-apps.question: Is app store submission included?
mobile-apps.answer: Yes, we manage the submission processes to the App Store and Google Play Store on your behalf.

mobile-apps.question: How are app updates handled?
mobile-apps.answer: We provide regular updates and new feature additions as part of our maintenance packages.

custom-software.question: Can it integrate with our existing systems?
custom-software.answer: Yes, we provide integration with your existing ERP, CRM, or other systems via API.

custom-software.question: Will we own the source code?
custom-software.answer: Yes, upon project completion, all source code and documentation will be delivered to you.

custom-software.question: Is training and support included?
custom-software.answer: Yes, user training and technical support for a certain period are included in all our projects.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: The protection of your personal data is important to us. On this page, you can find information about how your data is collected, used, and protected.
privacy.introduction:
As AppyKod, we attach great importance to the protection of personal data of our visitors and customers. This privacy policy has been prepared in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK) and the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

This policy explains how your personal data collected when you visit our website or use our services is processed.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data Collection
dataCollection.content:
We may collect the following personal data on our website:

• Contact Form: Name, email address, and message content
• Cookies: Website usage data and your preferences
• Google Analytics: Anonymous usage statistics
• Communication: Information you provide via email or phone

This data is collected to provide our services, facilitate communication, and improve the website.

dataUsage.title: 2. Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
Your collected personal data is used for the following purposes:

• Responding to your contact requests
• Providing information about our services
• Improving website experience
• Fulfilling our legal obligations
• Business development and marketing activities (if you consent)

Your data is stored only for the specified purposes and for legal periods.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.content:
Our website uses cookies to improve user experience:

• Necessary Cookies: Required for basic website functions.
• Analytics Cookies: We collect website usage statistics with Google Analytics.
• Preference Cookies: Used to remember settings such as your language preference.

You can manage your cookie preferences from your browser settings. However, some website features may not work when certain cookies are disabled.

thirdParty.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
We use the following third-party services to provide our services:

• Google Analytics: Website traffic and usage analysis
• Email Services: Delivery of contact form messages
• Hosting Services: Secure storage of website and data

These services are subject to their own privacy policies and process your data only for service provision purposes.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We take the following measures to ensure the security of your personal data:

• Secure data transmission with SSL/TLS encryption
• Regular security updates and patches
• Access controls and authorization mechanisms
• Regular backup and data recovery procedures
• Security audits and penetration tests

All data is protected with security measures compliant with industry standards.

userRights.title: 6. User Rights
userRights.content:
Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the following rights:

• Right to Information: Learn which of your data is processed
• Right of Access: Request access to your personal data
• Right to Rectification: Request correction of incorrect or incomplete data
• Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data
• Right to Object: Object to data processing
• Data Portability: Transfer your data to another service

You can send an email to appykod@gmail.com to exercise these rights.
